text: The women's 100 metres hurdles event at the 1991 Summer Universiade was held at the Don Valley Stadium in Sheffield on 20 and 21 July 1991. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Marina Azyabina '''' |Mary Cobb '''' |Keri Maddox '''' |} ==Results== ===Final=== Results {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !
